1.content:
You make like a bat out of hell and dash right into your room. The door clicks locked right after you close it. There's nothing in here but you, your hit list, your powers, and the observing screen. Finally, after months and months of polishing your powers to perfection, you feel comfortable in taking your plan to the next step: Action. It's best if you played your fantasies out as you write them.

At the very top of the list is your first victim, Simer: Your former 10th grade teacher who often made snide remarks in regards to your weight back in high school. She was as stern as she was curvy.

(Looks like this: https://www.instagram.com/p/Bnb1EUWnkhz/...)

From your observations, Simer had a sweet tooth judging from the times you bribed her with candy just for a few extra points on homework assignments which broke the law. You often wondered how far Simer would go to please her sweet tooth.

Next is Leslie, the mean girl who works at Starbucks. There were many times were she would find you in the library and interrupt your studies for hours by playing loud music and obnoxiously mocking you.

Then there was Ghita. You only interacted with her once, but it never ceases to grind your gears. She upturned her nose and looked at you with pure disgust for carrying a bag of McDonald's through the college halls. She's definitely going to pay for that.

Lastly, there's Kim, a dorky, thick thighed hispanic girl who stalked you for months. She often made it seem she would do anything to be in your presence and gain your approval.

You pull out your revenge list and began to scan through the names. "I choose."

11.content:
Your attention shifts to the observation screen that finds Simer's location. It takes you back to the school that you parted ways from some time ago. Simer looks like she hasn't aged a day nor put on any weight, but her killer curves remain seated in a wooden chair she's had for years now.

An orange light seeps in from the large window panes and bathes the entire classroom. Her desk is littered with ungraded papers in a disorderly fashion and to her right a neat stack of graded papers. Better known as organized chaos. Opposite to where she sits is a wall of science fair projects that have yet to be judged or properly demonstrated, yet her curiosity has been burning to find out what her students prepared.

Simer keeps her focus on the ungraded assignments before her, slips the red pen between her fingers, then begins checking away at any error her eye catches. During the tedious task of checking errors, Simer slips her free hand into the upper right desk drawer, "She's still at it, huh?" you remark, as Simer places a few candy bars on the desk.

While she mindlessly grinds away at grading papers, her other hands unwrap sweet chocolate goodness from the plastic prison. She takes slow, sizable bites to savor the flavor. A sweet smile crosses her lips as her pace steadies.

Your options for revenge are limited by your imagination.

"Well, well, well. What to do? What to do?"

What do you do to kick off your fattening revenge plot?

Leslie mocked and rolled her eyes at you every time you made an order, no matter how simple it was. The act left you fuming, just hoping for a way to get revenge on the disrespectful woman.

You remember that Leslie was actually quite thick at the time. The black Starbucks shirt clung tightly to her bosom. She was clearly past a DD cup size and downright harbored E cups.

And of course you couldn't forget the day you walked behind her on the way to the library. The sway of her wide hips felt downright hypnotizing with the size of her ass being ginormous. Her thighs practically had to be thick enough to suffocate someone stuck between them.

"Let's see what she's up to," Using your magical person viewer you spot Leslie sitting alone at Applebee's. She's taking turns between eating her salad and playing on her phone. "What the?" At that moment, you see that her breasts are visibly smaller to a disappointing degree. In fact, Leslie looks thinner than what she used to look like the last time you saw her. Over to her phone, you can see pictures of the salad she's eating on her social media accounts followed by captions celebrating another thirty pounds lost."How can she be proud of how she looks now? She looked hotter with the extra weight."

Between the salad and her phone, Leslie picked up another item, a vape pen. She took in a long drag and exhaled the smoke in the form of a white wispy cloud. Clearly she's picked up a habit to ease the stress of not binge eating. She waved the smoke from her red dyed pixie cut hair that complimented her mocha skin tone.

121.content:
You focus your attention on the vape pen Leslie pinched between her fingers. In an instant you change the properties of it to increase Leslie’s appetite. Her eyes remained glued to the menu while she took long drags from the vape with minimal breaks between exhales. The more she allowed the smoke to stir in her lungs the more successful your plan for revenge came to be.

Not long after, a waiter approached Leslie’s side, “I hope you enjoyed your salad, is there anything else I can get for you?”

Leslie bit her bottom lip, “I shouldn’t…but can I get…”

Two hours passed by after Leslie made the sudden decision. The booth she sat at is absolutely filled with plates of piping hot entrees with more to come. Grease dripped down her chin with every bite of a Brunch Burger. Leslie took long slurps of soda, the substance she denied herself for months to lose weight, and shortly requested another refill.

And all between her continued feast, Leslie took breaks to take a drag from the vape pen.

It wasn’t until an hour later that Leslie’s feast came to an end by the power of Applebees closing for the night. "Ugh, I can't believe I relapsed like that." Leslie groaned sluggishly making her way to her car. She held a hand on hr stomach that took a full, roundish shape like a basketball. Truthfully, who knows how long she would've went on if Applebees didn't close down for the night. All she knows is that, she’s thankful no one else was there to see her embarrassing gluttony.

Leslie hobbled into her car and drove off to her apartment. Or atleast, that was until, Leslie caught a whiff of Jack-in-the-box that made her taste buds go wild.

"This is going to be JUICY,“ You mutter to yourself as the Leslie’s internal conflict begins to boil over.

13.content:
Today started like any other day.

Clock into work.

Greet the old lady receptionist with a simple, “Good morning.”.

Plop down right in front of the computer and start grinding away at unanswered emails.

Despite how it sounds, Ghita’s job wasn’t a boring one at times. Everyday comes with an opportunity to meet someone and do something new.

Today for work, Ghita wore a long shirt with gold and dark spirals that hung to mid thigh and pitch black pants. She had straight long black hair that hung down her back and big golden hoop earrings dangling at her slender neck. Her outfit wasn't exactly form fitting. If anything, it draped over her tall, lanky, six foot tall figure.

Ghita logged into her work computer to view her work for the day, “Ah, just meetings...with one happening right now? Who is Chen?” Just then a knock came from the door, “Come in.” Ghita instructed. Chen brushed her straight dark hair from her eyes and opened with a smile across her chubby cheeks. Her whole body looked like it was coated with several layers of blubber, especially her big launch of a belly that hung just slightly below her waistline. Her whole body barely fit past the door frame as her bulky stomach took the lead. She stood about five inches below Ghita's height, yet was four times as wide. Chen took a few steps in then carelessly plopped down on the chair opposite of Ghita which excited the fear of it crumbling under the woman’s weight.

Ghita had been visited by plenty of Indian students on the college campus, but she hasn’t seen one with such a portly stature as Chen. She slightly shook her head, “So tell me, Chen. What is it that you’re visiting for?”

“Um, I’m visiting because I feel out of touch with the other Indian students on campus. I was born in America, but the others are all transfer students and I really don’t speak the language well or, uh, at all for that matter. I was told getting in touch with you would be a great way to start fitting in.”

Ghita held her tongue from making a remark on “fitting in”. She clasped her hands together, “Well, you’ve come to the right person!” Ghita looked back at her monitor to see the number of morning emails piling high, “Seeing as I do have plenty of work to catch up on, how’s about we meet for lunch in the cafeteria? Say 12 o’ clock?”

“Sounds perfect!” Chen says with a smile.

Ghita excused Chen from the office, once again noting that her body barely fit through the door frame.

“What does she eat to get to that size? Guess I’ll find out in a few hours.”

Before falling back into the monotonous task of answering emails, Ghita stops by the office snack table and helps herself to a few slices of kraft cheese, crackers, and a small cup of juice.

With your manipulative powers, what happens now?
13.title: Ghita

choices: Ghita's binge eating continues for weeks!
It's almost 12 o' clock. Get to the cafeteria!
Having finished work and pizza, Ghita takes a nap!
131.content:
Ghita took the plate back inside the office to snack on while she tackled her daily workload. After a few emails, her fingers only scrapped against crumbs scattered on the plate. Now, she isn't one to have a big appetite or be much of an eater, yet for some reason Ghita felt hungrier than when she picked her first snacks. She arrived at the snack table once again and filled her plate even fuller than last time.

Then once again, after hacking away at the work load, it became apparent that a few slices of cheese and crackers wouldn’t satisfy her sudden appetite. Ghita poked her head out of the office, and to her surprise she saw no one around. In a sudden act of incredible greed, Ghita took everything she craved from the catering table into her office. A whole 32 ct tray of assorted cookies, a sheet cake, sugary juice, croissants, and liquid coffee creamer to drink.

For the next couple of hours, Ghita ate away at a feast of snacks while working just to keep her attention fixated. “This isn’t normally like me,” she thought, bringing a plastic fork that stabbed a chunk of cake into her mouth, "Maybe it's a subconscious thing telling me I'm too skinny." Ghita's self rationalization went back to the meeting with Chen just an hour ago.

Perhaps it wasn't that Chen was large for her size, but maybe it's Ghita who's too thin?

Once the workload had been vanquished, Ghita's fingers were free from pecking away at the keyboard.

"Thank God no one is around to see this." She mumbled while stuffing everything into the small trash can. Her stuffed stomach acted as an obstacle against her own movement. As she moved about the office, Ghita caught a reflection of herself in the full body mirror, “I look pregnant!” She quietly shrieked, noticing her distended stomach becoming a distinguished feature in her side profile.

Just as she thought this sudden act of gluttony would never happen again for fear of her own weight a knock came from the door. No one was behind the door after she opened it. Not another soul in the office, as usual given the other employees being busy with student activities. The only exception being the receptionist. Ghita turned her head towards the snack table to see a stack of extra large pizzas right on the snack table.

It happened once again. That feeling of mixed gluttony and greed controlling her instincts. She grabbed the entire stack of three pizzas and vanished back into her office.

“This must be some kind of cruel joke someone is playing on me." Ghita groaned while cramming a greasy slice of pizza in her mouth, "Pizza should not be this tasty. I just pray that I never eat like this ever again."

What happens next?
131.title: Just a "few" more snacks

154.content:
Moving down through your list, you spot a name that instantly boils your blood; Nina.

The story behind your anger is reasonable. Long ago, one afternoon in between classes you were doing research for a project. Set to your side in the college library was your book bag and college identification card, both withholding access to essential necessities for your daily college life. At the time it was only you and Nina inside the library.

Students often questioned about whether Nina was a college student or some lonely woman who lived in the library. Either way you didn’t mind her being there, until in a blink of an eye, both your belongings and Nina were suddenly nowhere to be seen in the library.

One week and many dollars spent recovering everything you've lost still sets you back in your studies. The mysterious unseasoned event still grinds your gears.

You pick up your surveillance orb to find Nina. She sits at a table far away from any other individual and reads from a stack of books she’s collected for herself. Today’s read is the classic book Dune by Frank Herbert.

The chilly fall weather breezes in through a crank in a nearby window. Nina sips from her large pumpkin spice latte to keep herself warm and comfortable.Usually, Nina’s daily caloric intake consists of whatever she gets from the library concessions or from the vending machines. Food stuff like sandwiches, pastries, chocolates, and salads. Caffeinated drinks like creamy cappuccinos and lattes were a must and took up most of her daily caloric needs.

It’s strange. There’s no indication of the woman having a job except she clearly has enough money to keep her sedentary hobby going with whatever funds she has.There’s no way you could approach Nina to ask for your card back. The claim could be easily denied and exaggerated to the point of causing trouble. It’s best to stand back and work with what you can only to strike when ready.

With the environment and knowledge you just obtained, what could you do to Nina to take revenge?
